name: Game of Io Ninja - Fun Slice
name_original: Game of Io Ninja - Fun Slice
description:
The challenging and interesting arcade game that makes you addicting. Game of Io Ninja is the fun slicing action that pushes the cubes of your speed and reaction.

There has never been a better time to play Game of Io Ninja, so unsheathe your sword and get the control over the gameplay and defend the bottom line area from slithering boxes.

How to play:

Slice for a high score, use special multi-slice bonus and multi-touch to maximize effect, and go crazy on slicing the mega box-boss. Not to slice enemy boxes as the game will over.

Try it now, play and have fun!!!
